description: If you are looking to expand your business into solar energy or you are looking to start a career in solar energy, this is the perfect course. It is designed for HVAC, roofers, contractors and handimen  who want to get into solar energy. It is also extremely useful for those considering a career in selling solar energy.  Who buys solar? How do you sell it?  How much does it cost?  How much can you earn?  It is all explained in this course.
title: Master Overview of a Career in Solar Sales
